mapper.sql: service_id as serviceId, service_name as serviceName, create_time as createTime, create_user as createUser, last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, last_modify_user as lastModifyUser
mapper.insert: insert into cmdb_resource_service( service_id, service_name, create_time, create_user, last_modify_user ) values( #{serviceId}, #{serviceName}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{lastModifyUser} )
mapper.update: update cmdb_resource_service set service_id=#{serviceId}, service_name=#{serviceName}, create_time=#{createTime}, create_user=#{createUser}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser} where service_id=#{serviceId}
